Plot
Long ago in the Iron Age a shadow loomed over a lonely village. 
For generations the village youths are stolen from their families 
and delivered as sacrifice to a mythical beast - the Minotaur, 
that dwells beneath a great palace. Theo, haunted by the loss of 
his love in an earlier sacrifice is convinced that the beast 
isn&#039;t real and that his girl still lives as a slave within the 
palace. His father Cyrnan, the village leader, tries to reason 
with Theo not to go but Theo is driven by blind rage. He devises 
a plan and is taken with the other youths who are dragged 
screaming from their families.
